name: Koromu Auto Battler
storyline:
A crossover game featuring a futuristic retelling of the classic love story of Koromu and the rise of 12 super women heroes based on Unreal characters.
In the beginning of 202,020 A.D., a heart-broken orphan girl starts her inter-constellation journey in search of the Three Life Stones, which she believes can help her reunite with her very dear Mom and Dad. With tears in her eyes and weapons in her hands, she desperately fights her way through 12 battlegrounds across the Galaxy Empire, and eventually makes it to the Imperial Capitol, where a fatal surprise awaits her...
summary: Along your journey across 12 constellations of the Galaxy Empire, you will fight your way out with 12 alien goddesses, until revealing the sacred mystery of Koromu, a long-lost book of predictions for human destiny!
